ArrayLengthsMismatch().details: The lengths of the input arrays are not the same.

Reentrancy().details: This function does not support reentrancy.

aggregateWithSender(address[],bytes[],ui.details: Aggregates multiple calls in a single transaction.      This method will set `sender` to the `msg.sender` temporarily      for the span of its execution.      This method does not support reentrancy.

params.data: An array of calldata to forward to the targets.
params.targets: An array of addresses to call.
params.values: How much ETH to forward to each target.

returns._0: An array of the returndata from each call.
